title: Framerate crashes down to single digits
body:
As of Wednesday I've had the fps drop down to 8 frames every single game and functionally stay there. Nothing's changed in terms of background programs, graphics driver is up-to-date, nothing has changed. Have even used system restore to before the issue came up and still fps is unplayably low.

Has anyone had this happen to them at the same time or know what may be the cause?

replies.body:
Do you mind posting the specs of your PC here? 

Also, have you updated drivers, your OS, and also played around with the video settings within the League client?
